00021 using Gtk;
00022 
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Text;
00025 
00026 using NyFolder;
00027 using NyFolder.Utils;
00028 using NyFolder.GUI.Base;
00029 
00030 namespace NyFolder.GUI.Dialogs.LoginDialog {
00032     public class MenuManager : NyFolder.GUI.Base.UIManager {
00033         // ============================================
00034         // PUBLIC Constructors
00035         // ============================================
00037         public MenuManager() : base("LoginMenuGroup") {
00038             AddMenus(GetUIString(), GetActionEntries());
00039         }
00040 
00041         // ============================================
00042         // PRIVATE Methods
00043         // ============================================
00044         private string GetUIString() {
00045             StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
00046             sb.Append("<ui>");
00047             sb.Append("  <menubar name='MenuBar'>");
00048             sb.Append("    <menu action='FileMenu'>");
00049             sb.Append("      <separator />");
00050             sb.Append("      <menuitem action='ProxySettings'/>");
00051             sb.Append("      <separator />");
00052             sb.Append("      <menuitem action='Quit'/>");
00053             sb.Append("    </menu>");
00054             sb.Append("    <menu action='HelpMenu' position='bot'>");
00055             sb.Append("      <menuitem action='About' position='bot'/>");
00056             sb.Append("    </menu>");
00057             sb.Append("  </menubar>");
00058             sb.Append("</ui>");
00059             return(sb.ToString());
00060         }
00061 
00062         private ActionEntry[] GetActionEntries() {
00063             ActionEntry[] entries = new ActionEntry[] {
00064                 new ActionEntry("FileMenu", null, "_File", null, null, null),
00065                 new ActionEntry("HelpMenu", null, "_Help", null, null, null),
00066     
00067                 // File Menu
00068                 new ActionEntry("ProxySettings", "Proxy", "Proxy Settings", null, 
00069                                 "Setup Proxy", new EventHandler(ActionActivated)),
00070                 new ActionEntry("Quit", Gtk.Stock.Quit, "Quit", "<control>Q", 
00071                                 "Quit NyFolder", new EventHandler(ActionActivated)),
00072 
00073                 // Help Menu
00074                 new ActionEntry("About", Gtk.Stock.About, "About", null, 
00075                                 "About NyFolder", new EventHandler(ActionActivated)),
00076             };
00077             return(entries);
00078         }
00079     }
00080 }
